CustomField.inlineHelpText: What level of fear/anxiety/frustration does this animal show in new or novel environments.
CustomField.label: Adaptability

value.fullName: Low (Lower scores on daily observations – may need time and encouragement in new surroundings)
value.label: 1 - Lower scores on daily observations – may need time and encouragement in new surroundings

value.fullName: Medium (Higher scores on daily observations – explores when it can retreat)
value.label: 2 - Higher scores on daily observations – explores when it can retreat

value.fullName: High (Fearful protocol used, UBM, high needs inspectorate or caution sign used in care)
value.label: 3 - Fearful protocol used, UBM, high needs inspectorate or caution sign used in care
